entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Anthony Airport 2:27 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure: 98.8 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: ESE 46 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm south of Hare Bay. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries or local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
